name: puppeteer
description: Provides browser automation capabilities using Puppeteer.

name: time
description: Provides time and timezone conversion capabilities.

name: memory
description: A basic implementation of persistent memory using a local knowledge graph. This lets AI remember information about the user across chats.

name: github
description: Provides tools for interacting with GitHub repositories, including code search, issue management, and pull request operations.

name: filesystem
description: Provides file system operations including reading, writing, editing, and searching files and directories.

name: git
description: Provides Git version control operations including repository management, commits, branches, and diffs.

name: postgres
description: Provides read-only access to PostgreSQL databases, enabling schema inspection and data querying.

name: http-api
description: Provides tools for making HTTP requests to REST APIs and web services.

name: notion
description: Provides tools for interacting with Notion workspace, including page management, database operations, and content creation for collaborative documentation.

name: google-drive
description: Enables access to Google Drive files and documents, allowing AI assistants to manage, search, and process cloud-based documents and files.

name: slack
description: Provides Slack messaging and channel management capabilities, enabling team communication and collaboration workflows.

name: confluence
description: Atlassian Confluence integration for document management, knowledge base access, and collaborative content creation.

name: jira
description: Jira project management integration for issue tracking, task management, and agile workflow automation.

name: pandoc
description: Seamless document format conversion using Pandoc, supporting Markdown, HTML, PDF, and various other document formats.

name: textin
description: Advanced OCR and document processing tools including text recognition, ID recognition, and invoice processing with Markdown conversion support.

name: paperless
description: Integration with Paperless-NGX API for document management, tagging, and organization of digital documents.

name: markitdown
description: Universal document converter that transforms files and web content into markdown format for AI processing and documentation.

name: unstructured
description: Open-source ETL solution for transforming complex documents into clean, structured formats suitable for language models and AI processing.

name: gotenberg
description: Developer-friendly API for converting numerous document formats into PDF files and other formats with high quality output.

name: tesseract-ocr
description: Open-source Optical Character Recognition engine for extracting text from images, scanned documents, and PDF files with high accuracy.

name: paddleocr
description: Multilingual OCR and document parsing toolkit supporting 80+ languages recognition with practical ultra-lightweight OCR system.

name: easyocr
description: Ready-to-use OCR with 80+ supported languages and all popular writing scripts including Latin, Chinese, Arabic, Devanagari, Cyrillic and etc.

name: monday
description: Monday.com project management system integration - a complete Work OS designed to help teams complete projects efficiently and collaborate effectively.

name: notion-advanced
description: Advanced Notion API integration providing enhanced capabilities for workspace management, database operations, and collaborative documentation.

name: google-sheets
description: Google Sheets API integration with comprehensive reading, writing, formatting, and sheet management capabilities for spreadsheet automation.

name: microsoft-365
description: Comprehensive Microsoft 365 suite integration using Graph API, including Outlook, mail, files, Excel, calendar, and Office applications.

name: onlyoffice
description: ONLYOFFICE document processing integration for real-time collaborative editing of texts, spreadsheets, presentations, and PDF documents.

name: nextcloud
description: Nextcloud content collaboration platform integration for file sharing, document collaboration, and team communication tools.

name: amap-maps
description: 高德地图MCP服务提供全场景覆盖的地图服务，包括地理编码、逆地理编码、IP定位、天气查询、路径规划、距离测量、关键词搜索等12大核心服务接口。

env.AMAP_MAPS_API_KEY: 您在高德官网上申请的key

name: firecrawl
description: Firecrawl MCP服务提供网页爬取能力，支持将网页内容转换为结构化数据，适用于信息收集和数据提取场景。

name: sequential-thinking
description: Sequential Thinking MCP服务帮助智能体进行逐步思考和逻辑推理，适用于解决复杂数学问题和逻辑推理任务。

name: quickchart
description: QuickChart MCP服务提供图表生成和数据可视化能力，支持生成各种类型的图表用于数据展示和分析。
